languages.text: {n}Упрямо скрипнув зубами, Соломон хрипит:{/n} "Я их видел".
{n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."
languages.original_text: {n}Упрямо скрипнув зубами, Соломон хрипит:{/n} "Я их видел".

languages.text: « Je les ai vus, » {n}répond Solomorne avec obstination à travers ses dents serrées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: « Je les ai vus, » {n}répond Solomorne avec obstination à travers ses dents serrées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばり、頑なな様子でかすれた声を絞り出した。{/n}「奴らを見たんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばり、頑なな様子でかすれた声を絞り出した。{/n}「奴らを見たんだ」

languages.text: {n}Apretando los dientes, Solomorne jadea:{/n} «Los he visto».
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Apretando los dientes, Solomorne jadea:{/n} «Los he visto».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧牙关，喘息着说道。{/n}“我看到他们了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧牙关，喘息着说道。{/n}“我看到他们了。”

languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth obstinately, Solomorne rasps,{/n} "I saw them."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne beißt die Zähne zusammen und ächzt:{/n} "Ich habe sie gesehen."
